hero.title: Proyecto Radio
hero.subtitle: The radio that unites us
hero.description: A multilingual digital community radio connecting cultures through music, stories, and conversations.

home.whatWeAreDesc: We are a digital community radio that celebrates linguistic and cultural diversity. We broadcast in French, English, and Spanish, building bridges between communities.
home.inclusivityDesc: Every voice matters. We celebrate cultural and linguistic diversity.
home.communityDesc: We build bonds between people from different backgrounds and cultures.
home.creativityDesc: Music and art are the universal language that connects us all.
home.closingMessage: We exist for you and because of you.
home.axis_youthItems: Youth programs, creativity and technology workshops

about.volunteerDesc: We're always looking for passionate voices. Contact us to join the team.

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: The origin and evolution of Proyecto Radio
history.narrative: Proyecto Radio was born from the dream of a group of neighbors who believed in the power of radio to unite communities. Since its first broadcasts, the station has become a cultural bridge connecting people of different backgrounds, languages, and traditions.
history.missionDesc: Connect communities through inclusive, multilingual radio content.
history.visionDesc: Be the leading community radio worldwide.
history.valuesDesc: Inclusivity, creativity, respect, and community commitment.

howTo.title: How to Participate?
howTo.subtitle: Your voice can be part of our station
howTo.intro: At Proyecto Radio we believe everyone has something valuable to share. If you're passionate about radio, music, culture, or simply want to contribute to your community, we're waiting for you!
howTo.step1Desc: Send us your application with your details and interests.
howTo.step2Desc: We conduct a brief audition to get to know you better.
howTo.step3Desc: We prepare you with radio production workshops.
howTo.step4Desc: You start your show on the station!

howTo.proposal: Your proposal (what would you like to do on the radio?)
